actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make grants for the construction of bikeways in urbanized ares.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make grants for the construction of bikeways in urbanized areas. Provides that the Federal share of any project for the construction of a bikeway shall be 80 percent of the total cost of such project, with the remaining 20 percent of such cost to be paid by the grantee. Authorizes $10,000,000 to be appropriated per fiscal year from the Highway Trust Fund, and $10,000,000 per fiscal year out of any other money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make grants for the construction of bikeways in urbanized ares.
